## DidService type

Services are used in DID documents to express ways of communicating with the DID subject or associated entities. A service can be any type of service the DID subject wants to advertise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DidService = {
    id: string;
    type: string;
    serviceEndpoint: string | DidServiceEndpoint | DidServiceEndpoint[];
    description?: string;
};
```
**References:** [DidServiceEndpoint](./dids.didserviceendpoint.md)
